pages.text: Spells are essential to use your class abilities at their $(l)fullest$().$(br2)To get them you will need a $(l)$(6)Spell Binding Table$(), to transform a normal book into a $(l)$(2)Class Manual$().$(br2)Then you will be able to enchant it with its own spells.
You can also find one in $(o)some$() villages at a $(l)gazebo$() structure.$(o) (they are very rare)$()
